Detailed Description

A little extension of the wxKeyBinder class.

wxKeyProfile adds a NAME and a DESCRIPTION to the wxKeyBinder class; these are useful when you want to support more than one wxKeyBinder in your application to give to the user the possibility to choose among different keymapping schemes...

bool wxKeyProfile::Save (  wxConfigBase *    p,
const wxString &    key = wxEmptyString,
bool    bCleanOld = FALSE
)  const
 

Saves the array of keybindings into the given wxConfig object.

All the keybindings will be saved into subkeys of the given key.

Parameters:
bCleanOld  If TRUE, this function will erase the given key before writing into it.

Reimplemented from wxKeyBinder.
